help.password_min_4: Password must be at least 4 characters

401.label: Authorization Error
401.desc: Request failed because you have no valid credentials to submit the request

403.label: Access Denied
403.desc: Access to this resource is restricted on the server

404.label: Sorry! Page Not Found
404.desc: The page you are looking for does not exist. It may have been moved or deleted

500.label: Internal Server Error
500.desc: An unexpected situation occurred on the server preventing the request from being fulfilled
